entry.title: Does it have Chinese version of Journal voucher form template in Public Cloud 2508 version?
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We need to customize a Journal voucher form template in Public cloud 2508 version. For SAP predelivered Template FIN_FO_CORR_INTDOC_ENTRY, there are too many fields needs to be hidden and adjusted.

Does SAP provide a common and simplified template for Chinese users? Which debit amount and credit amount are in different column, and both are with positive figures.

Thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Redirect navigation to extended ‚ÄúManage Central Purchase Contracts‚Äù app
entry.content:
Hello Experts, good day.

We are facing a peculiar situation and I would like to know if anyone has any ideas on how we could resolve it.

We created an extension of the standard Manage Central Purchase Contracts app. The change was developed in SAP BAS, and the deployment was successful. We also created a target mapping and a tile to use the new extended app. Up to this point, everything works fine, and all tests ran successfully.Target Mapping Inbound Navigation

However, we encountered another issue.

We noticed that a user is working with the Process Purchase Requisitions Centrally app, which includes an option to open the Manage Central Purchase Contracts app. What we need is for this navigation to open our extended app instead of the original standard one.

The problem is that we don‚Äôt know how to achieve this.
Do we need to extend the Process Purchase Requisitions Centrally app as well?
Or is there any way to adjust the target mapping or redirect the navigation without modifying that app?

We are honestly a bit lost on how this could be done, and any guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
EBZ

entry.title: How to Calculate VAT for PO and get in the Standard form(MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER)
entry.content: Hello experts, I‚Äôm using the PO form template MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER. I need to calculate VAT at line item level, sum it up, and show the final amount including VAT in the PO PDF. I understand VAT fields exist in PO item conditions, but they are not exposed in the delivered template. Could you guide me on how to expose these fields via CDS/OData and bind them in the form template, including the calculation logic for summation? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: ABAP Runtime error when adding WBS element to the Sales Order
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I‚Äôm working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I‚Äôm trying to create a sales order using the standard ‚ÄúManage Sales Orders‚Äù app.

The error only happens when I add a WBS Element to the sales order item. As soon as I enter the WBS element and press Enter or try to save, I get the following error popup:

  • ABAP Runtime error 'MESSAGE_TYPE_X'

  • Unspecified provider error occurred. See Error Context and Call Stack.

  • Resource not found for entity 'C_SALESORDERMANAGE'

( Screenshot attached)

Has anyone seen this issue before in Public Cloud?
Is this related to a missing configuration, a restriction in the public cloud scope, or possibly a backend issue requiring SAP support? What should I check in the system?

Any guidance or hints on where to check would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: In public cloud how to get Sales Order Header Text
entry.content:
How can we read Sales Order Header Text in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (clean core, no modification)?

I have tried multiple ways but couldn‚Äôt get the header text of a Sales Order.
In Public Cloud:

  • Read_Text is not allowed

  • Table access to STXH/STXL is not allowed

  • CDS view extensibility for reading text via text-object/text-id is not available

  • BAdI access to SD text API is restricted

  • The only relevant released view is I_SALESORDERTP , but this cannot be used inside our custom CDS view.

entry.title: S/4HANA cloud public data migration practice test
entry.content:
Hello,

1. I am having issues with s/4hana cloud public practice test, exercise 9, data migration. I successfully downloaded and populated the .xml file with the data provided in the guided pdf doc and saved as .xml but I cant seem to validate, it keeps saying validation failed with error "

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong. The file contains only one line" I am sure my file has 3 lines as instructed in the pdf file. I have deleted and redownloaded several times. I have been on this for over 3 days now. Can someone help me? As I need to schedule my exam but I cant do that without completing the practice test. I have attached images of my .xml file and error messages and text of error messages. I cant proceed to exercise 10 without completing exercise 9.

ERROR:

Long Description

Short Text

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong

Diagnosis

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong. The file contains only one line.

Procedure

Check the file and correct the format.

 

 

2. I cant seem to start exercise 11 too "Copy and Edit a Standard Test Automate Process". I cant find the "Manage Your Test Processes App" as well under my practice test. Is exercise 9 a prerequisite for exercises 11 to 13 or why cant I find Manage Your Test Processes App? 

Please I need help as I have tried all means. Exercises 9 to 13 I am stucked! I cant schedule my exams without completing the practice test!

I am tired and frustrated its over 3 days now!!!

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud Public - Executing SOAP API upon Sales Order Creation (Before Save Logic)
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

We are seeking guidance on the best practice for implementing a custom action triggered during the Sales Order creation process in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

Core Requirement

We need to implement a Before Save action (similar to a Pre-Exit logic) during the creation of a Sales Order (SO) by the Key User. The goal is that, once the Sales Order is successfully created in the system, the external SOAP API: https://api.sap.com/api/SERVICECONTRACTREQUEST_IN must be consumed and executed immediately.

 

Specific Technical Questions

1. Internal API Consumption via ABAP Environment (ADT)

Internal Consumption via ADT: Is it possible to consume this specific SOAP API directly within the ABAP Environment (ADT) using Developer Extensibility options (e.g., via EML (Entity Manipulation Language) or an internal release)? Or is this API strictly intended for external consumption (side-by-side extensibility via RAP, Java, or JavaScript)?

  • If internal consumption is possible, what is the recommended BAdI (Business Add-In) in the Sales Order flow that executes after all consistency checks but before the final commit to ensure API execution aligns with the SO creation?

 

2. Locking Behavior & Concurrency

Locking Behavior: If a Key User currently has the specific Sales Order open and is actively using it within the UI, will the API request fail due to a locking conflict if the API attempts to create a follow-up document?

  • In systems like SAP Business ByDesign, concurrent editing is strictly disallowed. We would like to confirm if S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition behaves similarly, and what implications this has for external API calls triggered by the Key User's save action.

Thank you for your insights and recommendations.

entry.title: Can the S4/HANA Public Cloud Updates overwrite my Customizing without Z or Y?
entry.content:
we have to extend some entries in IMG, e.g. the valuation classes to implement the material account determination according our customers requirement. Ideally we can do it by using the same primary keys as we have on another SAP system the customers runs. There the primary keys are fully numeric. We have concerns to follow the same nomenclature in public cloud. Will IMG entries which don‚Äôt start with Z or Y be overwritten by future updates, in the case SAP will release new standard entries which are congruent to the entries we set up.

In on premise systems you can check through the delivery class of tables by yourself. There you can identify if the table is protected against SAP updates or if you have to protect your entries by using the Z/Y namespace.

Generally we want to prevent that updates will overwrite entries we will do when customize the system.

entry.title: Clarification Required on Cleared Amounts in Aging Report
entry.content:
I am working on a custom aging report using the CDS view I_OperationalAcctgDocCube. In the current setup, I am able to retrieve the Clearing Date and Clearing Journal Entry correctly. However, I am facing the following challenges and would appreciate your guidance:

  1. Cleared Amount in Report
    • I want to display the cleared amount (e.g., amount posted in Document Type KZ ‚Äì Vendor Payment) along with clearing details.
    • Please confirm if this field can be derived directly from I_OperationalAcctgDocCube, or if an association with another CDS view (such as I_JournalEntryItem) is required.
  2. Advance Payments
    • Advance payments also use Document Type KZ.
    • How can I differentiate advance payments from normal vendor payments in the report?
    • Is filtering by Special G/L Indicator (A) or another field recommended in Public Cloud?
  3. Duplicate

entry.title: Unable to update Journal Entry Line with KOART value "D"
entry.content:
In S/4 HANA Public Cloud, I'm trying to update the field Reference1byBusinessPartner using I_JournalEntryTP - Change but it keeps on failed return message "To be changed journal entry item could not be found".

I found that it only allows BSEG line with KOART values - S/A/M. The line that I'm trying to update has KOART value of D.

Is there any way for me to update the Journal Entry line item with KOART value of D?

entry.title: Archiving Custom Database Tables in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I'm currently working on a data archiving in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I have a few Questions about the Archiving of Custom Database tables.

For SAP standard tables, the process is well-defined and handled via the Information Lifecycle Management (ILM) framework, using standard ILM and archiving objects.

My challenge is with custom-developed database tables. I want to archive data from these tables, but I'm struggling to get the ILM framework to recognize my custom setup.

Here's what I've done so far:

  • I created a custom ILM Object and a corresponding Archiving Object for my custom DB table.

  • However, when I try to configure this ILM Object in the relevant ILM settings, I cannot assign the custom ILM Object to an Audit Area.

This leads to my main questions:

Is the ILM Framework fully supported and suitable for custom-developed tables and data archiving in SAP Public Cloud?

If yes, where can i configure the missing settings, so that the ILM Framework recognizes my ILM Object?

If ILM is not the recommended path for custom tables, what are the alternatives for archiving?

I'm considering the use of the Document Management Service (DMS) 

  1. Is DMS a viable storage for archived structured data?

  2. If so, would the data need to be converted into a specific document format (like XML or JSON) before being stored.

  3. Are there any best practices or recommended services/APIs in the Public Cloud specifically designed for archiving custom, structured business data outside of the standard ILM flow?

Any insights from someone who has successfully implemented archiving for custom solutions in the SAP Public Cloud would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Updating a custom field of std app with a custom app field that is created by dev extensibility
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a custom app that is created by Developer Extensibility in Eclipse.

I also have a custom field in std app of s4hana cloud that is created by using In-App Extensibility.

When new record is created(saved) in custom app,

I would like to update the value of  that custom app field to a custom field of std app.

Is it possible to do so?

If yes, could you please share how we can do it?

 

Thank You. 

Best Regards,

Aye Chan

entry.title: Can call Custom Business Object deployed from Eclipse CDS view from Customizing Tenant
entry.content:
Hello Community,

We created a custom Business Object (BO) in Eclipse (ABAP project) and deployed it to the Development tenant (080).
However, the BAdI implementation can only be done in the Customizing tenant (100).
In the Customizing tenant, we are unable to call either the CDS view or the outbound service of the custom BO.

Is there any alternative way to access the CDS view or outbound service of the custom BO from the Customizing tenant?
If yes, please share your experience.
